column4: Okay, Thank you d_1n..., it fixed it :) I wonder what caused it...
Yea, i did, lol, well, what is the code again so i can save as file? (Is there something like .bat for ubuntu 8.1)
you can save any commands as shell scripts, which you can execute. Typically they end with .sh
the shell script is to be run from the terminal, like "sh MyScript.sh"  but a launcher does that in a graphical way. So it's your choice.
